## $F_iO_2$

<iframe width="100%" height="221" frameborder="0"
  src="https://observablehq.com/embed/94d5d28b1408e309@187?cells=viewof+form%2Cviewof+Vtotal%2Cviewof+fio2"></iframe>

## Cadre de référence

\def\fox{FiO_2}
\def\vair{V_{air}}
\def\vox{V_{ox}}
\def\vtot{(\vair + \vox)}

$$ \fox=\frac{0.21 \cdot \vair + \vox}{\dot{V}_{total}}$$

$$\dot{V}_{O_2} = \dot{V}_{total} \cdot \frac{FiO_2 - 0,21}{0,79}$$
:::
